description:
Our story starts with Kyle and Alex arriving home from dinner, courtesy of his ring, they do the whole superhero flight. Alex loves it though she has to chide Kyle first. Once inside she jumps out of her clothes and beckons Kyle to the bedroom, he’s not in the doghouse anymore. He quickly follows her into the bedroom.

Major Force is on a plane to L.A. He’s being prepped by some suit, who has the audacity to imply he’s dumb. Major Force squeezes the suit's throat and gives him a stern warning not to do that $hit again. They then descend on L.A with him having all the info he needs to locate Alex.

At home Alex takes a shower while Kyle watches TV. He realizes a series of bizarre happenings are occurring in L.A. and Alex tells him to go do the hero thing. He wants her to come with him she declines, but promises that she will have a surprise for him when he gets back. He blasts off to L.A. where a city from the future has materialized. An earthquake starts and Kyle has to save the whole city. Back at home Alex hears a knock at the door. She answers the door and is quickly attacked by Major Force who asks her where her boyfriend is. He chases her to the kitchen where she tries to cut him with a knife. It breaks on his chest and he starts to beat her up and questions her again. When she doesn’t comply he stranglers her. After she dies he moves off her body. Kyle saves the future city and they all disappear to their correct time lines. Kyle flies back home ready for his present.

When Kyle arrives home he sees a note on the table, his “present is in the fridge,” he goes to the kitchen only to find Alex’s mutilated and contorted body stuffed into the fridge. Kyle freaks out and Major Force walks in beckoning he hand over the ring and get a quick death. Major Force also boasts he’s the one who killed Alex. Kyle blasts him out of the building and in a rage he injures the villain and proceeds to almost kill him. At the last moment his ring runs out of power, Kyle is in shock as Major Force descends on him.

End of issue
name: Forced Entry

description: Part 4 of the 5-part 'Godspawn.' The countdown to ZERO HOUR continues as the origins of the malevolent Hawkgod are revealed. When the Golden Age Hawkgirl becomes the Hawkgod's next human host, Hawkman must choose between letting the Hawkgod go unopposed, or fighting it at the cost of Hawkgirl's life.
name: Godspawn, Part 4: An Angel Chained In Hell

description:
After wounding Redzone in battle, Huntress barely avoids being gunned down by the police before resuming her pursuit of "Tough" Tony Bressi. That pursuit also brings her closer to Spano, the mysterious smiling man from her past.

Huntress and Redzone have a battle against each other and later Huntress fights a bunch of hoods who work for Tony Bressi.
name: The Hard Place

description:
The League is left in the aftermath of the Judgement Day crossover. Ice had sacrificed her life to save the planet and now the various members of the Justice League International mourn their friend. Tempers and emotions run high as they return Tora's body to her home place in Norway.

Ice's mother, the sole survivor of her family, Queen Olafsdotter expresses to the League that Tora died because of them and the are no longer welcome in her homeland after the burial.

Meanwhile, Catherine Cobert begins the process of severring the UN's ties to the Justice League International.
name: Heroes Passage

description: Aftershocks, Part 3 of 3, continued from Justice League Task Force (1994) #15. In the face of the Justice League's imminent disbanding, Wonder Woman tries to pull the team together just long enough to complete a special mission.
name: Family Troubles

description: Part 2 of the 3-part 'Aftershocks,' continued from Justice League America (1987) #91. With the dissolution of the Justice League at hand, Martian Manhunter and Gypsy experience an unexpected new twist in their relationship. Concludes in Justice League Europe (1989) #67.
name: Silver Ages

description: Part 3 of 4. Still searching for the five truly evil men the devil requires as ransom for the world, Kid Eternity visits his mentor, Ricketts, who offers a clue to the Kid's other quest - his search for his parents.
name: The Dinosaur

description:
"End of an Era" Part 1! The ongoing struggle to reshape reality has stretched the 30th century to the breaking point, and even the Legionnaires may be unable to restore that shattered timeline! Continued in VALOR #22!

The Legionnaires continue to feel the effects of time anomalies, with new members joining and old members leaving. They are then attacked by a group of super villains from their past.
name: End Of An Era, Part One: History Lesson

description: Robin returns to Batcave to discover Bruce is the only Batman now, with Jean-Paul having left for good. Bruce plans to make some changes. Later, the two foil a museum robbery, and things seem to be back to normal.
name: KnightsEnd, Aftermath: The Triumph

description: The stakes are high for the Golden Age Sandman when Dian becomes the target of the Scorpion, a serial killer who wields a poison-tipped whip.
name: The Scorpion: 1 of 4

description: Rose Walker journeys to England and encounters three mysterious women, who tell her the strange tale of the children who flew away. "The Kindly Ones" part 6.
name: The Kindly Ones, Part 6

description:
The storyline reaches its climax with a shocking shopping excursion, the end of a pregnancy, a friend of the Devil, and far too many funerals. When the smoke clears, the Changing Man is changed again. "A Season in Hell" part 6.

Included at the back of this milestone issue is a pin-up gallery featuring art from: Chris Bachalo, Mike Allred, Brian Bolland, Kent Williams, Sean Phillips, Rian Hughes, Vince Locke, Patrick McEown/Rick Bryant and Ted McKeever.

Note: Death of the Endless makes a very small cameo in the hospital room.
name: A Season in Hell, Part Six

description: Captain Kirk is buried and wakes up in unfamiliar territory.
name: The Alone

description: Deanna Troi is stalked by a ruthless and relentless murderer who has apparently already killed Riker and Worf. To survive, Deanna herself may have to become a killer.
name: The Victim

description:
Guest-starring Superman, Icon, Rocket, and Static. Superboy, Rocket, and Static must team-up to take done Rift. Even if they succeed a universe still may die!

Superboy meets two young heroes. Rocket and Static! The three confront there greatest nightmare to both there worlds- RIFT! Will they themselves be triumphant in defeating rift or will they crumble from his power?
name: Worlds Collide, Part 8: Menace 2 Societies

description: Swamp Thing attempts to get to Amsterdam in search of Linda Holland, but hot on his trail are several shadowy elemental figures. Also in pursuit is a hunter of big game and monsters named Nelson Strong, a man who has trained his whole life for a confrontation with the Swamp Thing.
name: Big Game

description: When five sexy, motorcycle-riding vampire women slay their male master and set out to find freedom and 'new blood' on America's highways, no one is safe. Howler, their leader, is tortured by a memory from her human past, a secret that draws the Vamps into a twisted web of murder, abuse and societal injustice.
name: Freedom

description: The Witches' quest for revenge comes to a bloody conclusion in modern-day London, where a child killer proves to be the key to a long cycle of reincarnation and death.
name: Crone

description: Deathblow takes Sister Mary and Christopher to the headquarters of the Order of the Cross at Montcairn Abbey.

name: The Sign of the Cross, Part 2

description:
No longer happy with her bizarre life with Maxx, Julie with Sara’s help pack up and prepare to leave forever. Meanwhile the kidnapped Doctor reattaches Gone’s head while Gone entertains the Doc with a story.

Gone Tells us a Little Fairy Tail.

This fairy tail is the origin of Julie and why her spirit animal is a rabbit. Julie has a great relationship with her father, he is very child like while Julie’s mom is harsher and does what has to be done.

One day Julie finds a bunny that been hit by a car. She takes the injured bunny home thinking she can make it better. For days the bunny sits in a box under Julie’s bed coastally scratching the box, grinding on Julie and her parents nerves, till finally Julies Mom does what has to be done and kills the bunny with a shovel.

Mr. Gone explains that something in Julie shut off that night and is the reasons for the way Julie is.
Lurch regenerates and continues attacking Overlord! Meanwhile, one of The Nixed Men re-christens herself the She-Dragon and does battle with the son of SuperPatriot.

Part 3 of 4 in this climatic battle.

Spawn is persued by Sam, and Twitch, while he is trying to save his former best friend Terry from the hands of OvertKill!

Meanwhile Wanda has just learned about the two FBI murders that occured at her very house.

Now it looks like Terry is done for. Will he ever find out what happened to his family? Will the mob, and CIA ever stop chasing him? Will Spawn get there in time?!

Find out next time as this battle concludes
name: The Hunt Pt. 3

description: Battalion, Diva and Weatherman One, Henry Bendix, are questioned by a panel of officials to take responsibility for not following protocol when it came to events in Gamorra Island. Weatherman One decides to take full responsibility for the activities there and the panel decides to terminate his position in Stormwatch. Meanwhile, Hellstrike's body explodes while in the medical ward of Skywatch.

Supreme Madness Part 5: After the battle against Stormwatch, Supreme had fall on and destroy a carrousel where Pitt is expecting to take some rest. The half creed supposes than Supreme is a agent of Zoyvod and Supreme is paranoic. The fight is inevitable.  
Wjile the combat begins, Simple simon is exploring the Grizlock's secret laboratory. 
In new york, the two adversaries uses their mightiest blow. Supreme is about to win the fight but Pitt finds a last move: he snatchs supreme's hammer, source of his powers. 
The conclusion of this fight in the Supreme Madness finale.
name: Supreme Madness, Part 5

description: Rafferty is killing Ultra after Ultra ... and anyone who gets in his way is targeted for death as well.

name: Countdown to Ultraforce
Lapse
Into the Abyss

volume.name: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine -- Hearts and Minds

description: The Strangers are in a meeting, figuring out that there are still several people from the cable car incident that are not accounted for. The group adjourns and Yrial asks if she can accompany Zip Zap back to his neighborhood. He allows her to and they begin speaking about Zip Zap's past. Suddenly they are attacked by Gangsta and Brazen, two super-powered thugs that run some gangs in that neighborhood. Yrial is able to discern their weakness and defeats them while Zip Zap beats up his old gang. Surprisingly, Pilgrim arrives with Byter, his lackey, to take Gangsta and Brazen away to join a gang he is assembling. Yrial and Zip Zap rush to inform the rest of the Strangers this development.
name: Homeboy!

description: Atalon, a powerful being from an underground race, leads a gang of fellow underground mutants to steal warheads from all over the planet. Meanwhile, Prototype and Prime proclaim on television that they are starting an Ultraforce and they are going to inspect the rash of thefts on the weapon bases. Hardcase, Ghoul, and Pixx are on Contrary's airship, discussing the plight of the anti-ultra sentiment on the planet and how ultras need a leader to show normal humans that they are on their side to protect them. Hardcase, the obvious candidate for leadership, opposes the idea because he's already had to bury a super team. Prime and Prototype hastily go to Alabama, the last place that Atalon attacked. Hardcase wants to stop them immediately before they make the situation worse. Meanwhile, Topaz arrives on Earth and finds herself unsure as to how she got there, lashing out against all the men she has encountered. Contrary makes certain to recruit Topaz as Hardcase rushes off to Alabama. When Prototype and Prime arrive, they fight and are defeated by Atalon, who escapes. Hardcase arrives to save their lives in time. Contrary then arrives with Topaz, Ghoul and Pixx, informing Hardcase that she will have to lead the team if no one else steps up. This gives Hardcase cause to become their leader, the leader of Ultraforce, and he announces it to the media. Their first mission will be to stop Atalon from using the warheads he has stolen.
name: The Force Be With You

description: Shriek brings out the worst in Malcolm McBride, forcing him to become his violent alter ego, Carrion! Meanwhile, Peter finds his life collapsing in the wake of Aunt May’s health crisis. This is Spider-Man as you’ve never seen him before- violent, angry, and dead set on vengeance!
name: Peter Parker No More!

description:
Quicksilver is confronted by a person from his past who has reformed their anti-mutant sentiments. Plus, the Circle of Paqvane decides to teach Quicksilver another difficult lesson!

Quicksilver is confronted by an old aquaintance from Transia
name: Out of House and Home

description:
Overview

Continuing the most crucial storyline in Cap's history! Does Cap stand a chance against the combined forces of Damon Dran and Americop?
name: Cop Out

description: Daredevil's final showdown with System Crash! And, alongside Captain America, DD discovers the villainous organization's true allegiance…amongst the ranks of Hydra!
name: Tree Of Knowledge - Part 5: The Line Eaters

description:
Black Tom is once again broken out of holding by the Juggernaut. This time, however, the boys take a doctor with them. Later, Deadpool is hounded by men who work for Black Tom. Banshee and Siryn drop in the help. All seems well until Deadpool's regeneration abilities stop working.

Synopsis

In a covert facility, Black Tom Cassidy is experimented on by Dr. Killebrew in order to stop the wood-like growth taking over Black Tom's body. Black Tom is in incredible pain, but his torment comes to a close when the Juggernaut barges into the facility and abducts his friend. He takes Dr. Killebrew, who appears to have a cure for Black Tom in a folder marked "Wilson, Wade T.".

In a bar in New York City, Deadpool has an off night in picking up a girl and shows her his face. She flees the bar as armed soldiers enter. The soldiers attack Deadpool, but he makes light work of them - despite having to grow a spleen back. The soldiers get the upper hand, however, when they freeze Deadpool. Before they can remove the frozen mass, Banshee frees Deadpool with a screech. Banshee is surprised to see Deadpool - and vice versa. Siryn then shows up and stops the fleeing soldiers with screeches of her own. Banshee is disappointed that they can't follow the soldiers back to Black Tom. Deadpool is disappointed that the lovely Siryn isn't paying attention to him. The three then figure that Black Tom is not out to kill Deadpool but to capture him. (Deadpool and Black Tom previously tussled in the Circle Chase mini-series.)

Banshee decides to leave and gather intel from Interpol. Siryn wants to stay and keep tabs on Black Tom's target, but Banshee is hesitant, knowing that Deadpool is a loose cannon and not one to be trusted. Deadpool reminds Banshee of something called the Farouk Affair and Banshee decides that Deadpool can be trusted. Banshee leaves.

Deadpool then saves Siryn's life when one of the soldiers attacks with a sword. The soldier claims to be the best swordsman in five continents and manages to cut off Deadpool's hand. Deadpool finishes of the swordsman and then attempts to show off for Siryn by showing off his healing factor. His healing factor, however, does not work as usual. Deadpool ends up passing out from the loss of blood.
name: If Looks Could Kill
I Have Loved the Stars Too Fondly to Be Fearful of the Night

description:
While attending an AIDS rally, Hulk's former sidekick Jim Wilson is attacked. An enraged Hulk sees this and takes Jim back to the Mount for medical treatment. Meanwhile, at her job, Betty receives a call from a young man who just found out that he was infected with HIV and was planning to kill himself. Hulk assigns the top Pantheon doctors to begin treatment on Jim, but they tell him that it is useless and that they cannot prevent his death. Betty receives another call from the same man later in the night and continues to try and talk him out of his suicide attempt. Ultimately, the man parks his car on remote train tracks while Betty listens to the train hit his car. Jim pleads with the Hulk to give him some of his blood to save his life, but Hulk does not want Jim to turn into a Hulk-like creature. When the Hulk lied to Jim to give him hope, Jim saw through the lie and apologized for trying to pressure Hulk into giving him his blood before passing away.

Notes:

  • Ranked #26 in Wizard Magazine's list of "100 Best Single Issue Comics Since You Were Born".
name: Lest Darkness Come

concept_credits.name: 100 Best Single Issue Comics Since You Were Born

first_appearance_concepts.name: 100 Best Single Issue Comics Since You Were Born

description:
Tells the story of Jim Hammond, the original Human Torch's origin, through his own eyes.

Jim Hammond was created by the great scientist Phineas Thomas Horton, but Horton only intended to create a normal android, the flaming skin was an accident. The public feared the flaming man as a possible menace. Because of this and that Hammond could not control his flames he had to be incased in metal coffin and dropped into concrete where oxygen could not reach him, and therefore he could not burn. Under the concrete Hammond was taught about the world of man through an invention of Hortons. This learning method taught him the importance of "life" and "freedom", helping to mold him into the hero he would become.

The story ends with a crack in the concrete allowing oxygen to reach Hammond's body. His body quickly ignites and he blasts his way out of the prison, eventually learning to control his powers.
name: Book Zero

description:
"Back to Earth" continues, guest starring the Fantastic Four! As the team descends into the earth, they are attacked by new unexpected enemies! Who are they? What are they doing under Monster Island? And what's really going on with those seismic readings?

Summary
Down in the caverns under Monster Island, the Fantastic Four and the Silver Surfer plan to follow the seismic readings to the source of the problem. They are then ambushed by a group of Skrulls. They are defeated and tell the heroes that they are stranded with no way to communicate with empire. They were on a mission to detain watch an Inorganic Technotroid, a advanced nearly indestructible fighting machine.

The Surfer and the Four realize that this menace must be taken care of and begin to search for it. Once they find the Technotroid it begins to attack them. It is as impressive as the Skrulls claimed. The Surfer manages to do some damage to it before the Ant-Man reprograms it from the inside. Ant-Man repairs the Skrulls communication equipment so they can call home and the heroes continue on their mission.
name: Down To Earth: 3

story_arc_credits.name: Beware the Rage of a Desperate Man

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: Beware the Rage of a Desperate Man

name: Three Who Ride the Thunder!
Live and Let Die, Part Three: Shellshocked!

description: This is a what if? comic answering the question of, what would happen if Tony Stark made his design go public instead keeping it to himself. This causes the world to focus more of technology than anything else. This also would make any body that uses machinery to be more powerful whether they're hero or villain.
name: What If Iron Man went public?

description: Reprinting X-Men #4.
name: The Brotherhood of Evil Mutants

description: WORLDS COLLIDE, part THIRTEEN! As the heroes and villians of two realities scramble to build a new weapon, they realize that only ONE reality can survive! Concludes in STATIC # 14
name: Mirror Faces Mirror

description: Part 11 of 'Worlds Collide,' the 14-part DC/MILESTONE crossover event, continued from Superman The Man of Steel (1991) #36. Superman and Icon battle each other over the newly-merged bridge that joins Dakota and Metropolis while Rift waits in the wings to take on the winner. Continues in Steel (1994) #7.
name: Ain't No Such Thing As Superman

description: As Kobalt's training of Page continues, three superpowered criminals, Slick, Volt and Red Light, step in to take control of Milton St. Cloud's criminal empire.
name: Week One

description: Without Dharma's consent, a 'Trojan Horse' is planted to track down those responsible for the kidnapping of a major industrialist.
name: Father's Day, Chapter One: True Friends in Deed

description: The Heroes of two worlds must count on their combined strengths and wits to salvage Dakota and metropolis from the wrath of RIFT!!!
name: After Worlds Collide

description: Catholic Girl gets caught between a meat man some lesion dogs, as XOMBI and JULIAN PARKER prepare for the FOUR STABLE BOYS OF THE APOCALYPSE!
name: Silent Cathedrals Part Three: Screaming Meat

first_appearance_teams.name: The Order of the Spoken Flame

team_credits.name: The Order of the Spoken Flame

name: The Universal Ninja Puzzle

volume.name: Buck Godot - Zap Gun For Hire

name: Man-Eater! Part 3 - Out In The Garage

description: The Windwagon Gang rob a train carrying Aztek artifacts on loan from Mexico. At the request of the governor of Texas, The Lone Ranger and Tonto get involved, but with their relationship strained by a press that continually relegates Tonto to sidekick status, and The Ranger beginning to believe his own hype, can they hope to bring the villians to justice, or will their latest adventure be their last?

Goodtree is perfecting her divine talent as Treeshaper, a gift she shares with Redlance. While feeling through the essence of the soil, she is telepathically stung by the dark forces of her world.

She works out many details of her recognition with Acorn (conceiving the child Mantricker) and her relationship with Lionleader whom she spends most of her time with.
name: SHADOW PLAY

description:
This is the issue where Ember claims her ascendency as the new Wolfriders chieftess, her Chief's knot being tied into her hair by Skywise.
Meanwhile the situation of the tribe is not ideal. The group is exposed to any danger whatsoever and faces the danger of being tracked by Grohmul Djun's army. Ember decides to force Redlance to use his plant-divine gift to grow vines around the family as a shrowd.
name: FIRST STEP

description:
This copy may be read at http://www.elfQuest.com

The Villains

"The Black Snake", the former Gliders ruler after Lord Voll, Winnowill has developed morphic-capability. She grew a "fifth finger" and bethrothed herself to the most powerful of humans, the Warlord Grohmul Djun, and calling herselv "VENOVEL". Her Child, the Half-Troll Half-Elf Two-Edge built the citadel Palace for the human ruler, and speaks to her by "sending" through the walls of his masterpiece.

Assassins come for VenoVel and stab her through the heart, but her morphic- closes the knife in her chest, while she spins and delivers a death-blow to the culprit whil the other assassin runs away.

It is shown that with VenoVel as advisor, the Grohmul Djun has become pure evil. He and she watch as servants have dug graces in the underground of the Citadel tower, who are murdered using insanely crafty gadgets, and suddenly sealed in without reprieve.

Two-Edge aids Humans

The Djun's master builder is Two-Edge. VenoVel convinces the Djun to ask for trickier and trickier things and more beautiful corridors. Meanwhile a force found the Palace of The High-Ones washed to shore in SHARDs form, and this is delivered into the custody of Two-Edge.

Two-Edge also has built an underground tunnel-system under the city so he can sneak around.

He built tanks that have razors and cut down trees. It has a bizarre steam-power that uses a blazing central wood-fire to heat water that spin its tank-treads. Such a montrous device is employed by the Djun's warriors to cut a clear-path through the forces.
name: CLAY

description:
Cable…son of the Goblin Queen? That's what the evil sorcerer Belasco says, and if it's true, only Cable can stop sinister forces from creating a portal that will link Earth with the demonic realm of Limbo!

The Nexus of All Realities is being torn apart and Sym is at the center of it all. Cable must beat the demon before the Nexus consumes the earth. One problem, if Cable fails, the effects will be permanent.

Synopsis

Cable and Lee Forrester attempt to escape the old cabin as Belasco and D'Spayre fight. Cable leads through an open door and the two emerge from a large tower. Completely confused, the two are confronted by Belasco who introduces them to the Nexus of All Realities.

Belasco leads Cable and Lee through a discourse on the events of Inferno, in which Cable was used to open a portal from Limbo to Earth. When that plan failed, Cable was to be sacrificed in order to permanently bridge the two words. That also failed. Belasco hopes the Cable can help him control the Nexus. When Cable appears to be unwilling to help, Belasco tries to use magic to control Cable. It does not work. Belasco then turns to Lee and seals her mouth shut with her own flesh. Cable agrees to help the demon if Lee is spared. Belasco releases her.

S'ym arrives and he and Cable fight. The fight is soon over, however, and Belasco is able to close the Nexus. Cable and Lee decide to get back to their lives and Cable body-slides them out of the Everglades.
name: Fear and Loathing, Part 3: Behold the Son of the Goblin Queen

description: Armstrong's secret history with The Sect revealed! Journey to 12th century France to find out how this loose-moraled immortal hero earned the ire of the Valiant Universe's deadliest secret sociey with the help of his brother, the Eternal Warrior! But how do the Knights Templar, Richard Coeur de Leon, and a secret network of spies all fit into the grandest conspiracy that history has ever known?
name: The Root Of The Problem - Part 1: or What I Did To Infuriate The Sect

description: The Guardians of the Galaxy move toward East Europe to recruit some old acquaintenances, and start a new marvelous rescue in the deep of the cosmo.
name: He Who Loses Hope, May Then Part With Anything
Abyss

description: In Act II of our play we shall follow Steven through night and day, as he discovers that nothing's free... Especially not a ticket to the Showman's Theatre. And he does indeed have a big day ahead of him.
name: Act II: Unholy War

description:
Overview

Grendel Jonah gets crucified -- literally! -- Alexander reveals an important truth about his own past, the ice-station workers rebel and take charge, and a ravening mutant beast appears from the bowels of the icy earth! All this and more in the penultimate issue of Grendel Tales: The Devil in Our Midst.

Also in this issue: The return of the perverse Hitchcock Blue, who, in his quest for the Devil, goes to Pigsville to question the elusive Vaseline Tsusumi. Written and fully painted by Grendel creator Matt Wagner.
name: Chapter 4; Pigsville Part 1

volume.name: Grendel Tales: The Devil in Our Midst

description:
The ultimate climax to the KnightEnd arc.
 
Jean-Paul Valley is at Wayne Manor for a final confrontation with Bruce.  Jean-Paul angrily demands that Bruce take off his costume, saying that he is not the real Batman.  Bruce tries to reason with him but Jean-Paul refuses to relinquish the mantle of the bat, citing how he defeated Bane while Bruce spent too much time away from crime solving and that he should just be a billionaire playboy.
 
Bruce then recalls how Jean-Paul let a criminal die, feeling responsible and protective of his mantle he asks Jean-Paul to give up the costume.  Jean-Paul refuses and they battle it out through out the mansion.  Bruce realizes that Jean-Paul rigged the entrance to the cave with booby-traps, so he goes out to the mansion to an alternate route to the mansion: the well he fell through as a child.  He makes into the back of the cave while Jean-Paul waits unaware that Bruce is already there.  Bruce then uses the cave echoes to tell Jean-Paul to take off the costume.  The mentally unstable Jean-Paul believes the voice to be his father at first but figures out it's Bruce and charges after him.
 
Jean-Paul defiantly proclaims that without Batman he is nothing and declares he will not be nothing.  They fight in the cave as Bruce leads him away through a narrow part of the cave.  Jean-Paul's armor suit is too heavy and too big, so piece be piece he takes it off until he's left with his helmet.
 
He's ready to fight Bruce but he looks up to see the iconic Batman with light shining down from the well he fell down years ago.  Jean-Paul breaks down and tearfully professes that Bruce is Batman and gives up the mantle.  Bruce consoles Jean-Paul stating he won't take him to jail.  They climb up on to sunny Wayne Manor.  Bruce reflects that perhaps this is the time for some light in his life.  He forgives Jean-Paul and himself and wishes him luck on his new path.
 
Bruce walks back to the manor, he's not the Dark Knight today, but today he reclaims his life back.
name: Climax

volume.name: Batman: Legends of the Dark Knight

description:
1. Check part 1 (Comic)
Cerebus and Cirin start the Ascension. Cerebus thinks about the Judge and Cirin is nervous.

2. Check part 2 (Text)
Viktor talks about the Void

3. Tyrant (7 page preview by Steve Bissette)
name: Mothers and Daughters 35 : Check

description:
Aqualad returns, seeking the Sea King's help in locating a sunken nuclear submarine! This leads to a fierce battle with the villainous Charybdis, who holds hostage someone who will come to mean a lot to the Sea King: Dolphin.

Aquaman is sleeping in the Aquacave having vivid dreams of monsters, while Aqualad has come to investigate why no one has heard from the Sea King in weeks. Garth then attempts to bring Aquaman out of his shell then, attacking him before being battered by Aquaman. The duo then depart from the Aquacave, heading to assist the navy in finding a lost nuclear sub, and require the aquatic heroes aid much to Aquaman's suspicion.

The two then don radiation suits and investigate the sub on Strom's orders, where they find the crew dead. They are then ambushed by a man, called Charybdis who used the navy to lure Aquaman and Aqualad to him by threatening to crack the nuclear core if the Navy revealed he was waiting for them. Aquaman is then captured by the villain and taken to his lair, where he meets his other captive Dolphin. While elsewhere a bleeding Aqualad floats through the ocean being circled by several sharks.
name: Hitting Bottom
Things That Go Bump in the Night!

description: Helen is rushed to the hospital and John is faced with a terrible truth regarding his friendships. Meanwhile, Satan continues his plot against Constantine and searches for the whereabouts of Gabriel's heart! "Rake at the Gates of Hell" part 3.
name: Rake at the Gates of Hell, Part Three

description:
In Apocalypse’s citadel, the consciousness of En Sabah Nur is being prepared for its new host, Stryfe. Meanwhile, teenager Nathan Dayspring is dying from the techno-organic virus that has plagued him since birth. After struggling between life and death, Nathan finds a way to exist on the astral plane, and encounters his half-sister Rachel Summers.

Ch'Vayre turns on Apocalypse and attacks with Jean's help. Meanwhile, Nathan fights for his life as Cyclops looks on. Nathan pulls through and the Dayspring clan unites to stop Apocalypse from transferring his soul into Stryfe. Cyclops and Jean are then sent back into their present with Jean taking the name of Phoenix.

*References X-Cutioner's Song.

This series was followed up by Askani'Son.
name: Sacrifice

volume.name: The Adventures of Cyclops and Phoenix

description:
Overview

The mysterious anti-hero named Enemy went on a quest to discover his origins and veered off course to save America. Now, will he sacrifice his life for a country that scorns him before he can discover who he is and where he came from? The barrel is loaded for the final blow-out of this five-issue miniseries!

In the far future, humanity is in decline, the soul-possessing Vaylen are advancing, and man's only hope is Faith. On the distant outpost planet of Hotok, warrior-priest Faith and his elite troop, the Grey Rats, fight a desperate two-front war - the alien Vaylen invading from the stars, and the decay and corruption they find in Hotok society itself!

In the aftermath of Will to Power, the political scene in Arcadia is in turmoil. A group of high-powered Aracadians are looking to settle the scene to their own advantage with the help of Lord Alamout and his band of cybernetically controlled assassins. Their mission: to exterminate the most influential radio personality in Arcadia. X is set to intervene, but even if he reaches the dj first, will he get out fast enough to avoid the cybernetic assassins?
name: Devils

description:
The Badger is released from the mental hospital and Daisy Fields has the unenviable job of helping him reintegrate into society. Can a stressed-out Vietnam vet suffering from multiple personality disorder handle today's PC world?

But the Badger is the least of Daisy's problems. Between her drug-dealing boyfriend Eric, and the mysterious masked assailant, the Phantom, who seems to have developed a romantic fixation on her, Daisy has her hands full.

After an accidental shooting takes place at his son's school nearly injuring Kevin. Thunderstrike attempts to track down the people who are selling guns to children with unexpected help from Wildstreak and Bloodaxe.
name: Battle Lines!

description: Penn Selkirk's helicopter crashes atop Gotham's river bridge, which becomes the scene of a battle involving both Batmen, Catwoman and Selkirk. Selkirk refuses to surrender the neural enabler to Catwoman, tossing it into the river. Jean-Paul falls into the river, and Batman helps get the others to safety before the helicopter explodes. He then makes his way to the Batmobile, which Jean-Paul has booby-trapped. The Batmobile is blown sky high, and Jean-Paul emerges from the river, staking his claim to finally be the one, true Batman.
name: Falls Upon Wild Knights: Wild City

description:
Superman and Icon, the most powerful heroes of their respective worlds, take on the interdimensional menace Rift in an all-out battle to save Metropolis and Dakota.

Superman meets and joins forces with Icon and the Milestone heroes to defeat Rift, But will Rift's persuasive words turn Icon and Superman against each other?

Notes:

  • "DC Universe 18" one page advertisement piece with information on the upcoming Chicago Comicon 1994. Included are dates, times and location of the convention plus the creators who will be on hand at the show.
  • Read Hardware #18 before reading this issue.
  • Story continues in Icon #16.
  • Triangle 1994 #29.
  • Chronological continuation from Action Comics #701.
  • Chronological continuation in Superman #92.
name: A Rift in Reality

description: After defeating the Nameless One last issue, Anima, Animus, and Agent Woodleaf are transported to the alternate dimension of Arkana. Once there, goblin minions of the evil Mania attack Animus and Anima. Anima is saved by the mysterious Lost Johnny, a member of the rebel Archai, a group dedicated to stopping Mania from piercing the barrier between Arkana and Earth. However, Animus is taken by the goblin horde. Mania also gets her hands on Agent Woodleaf, lost in Arkana. Back on Earth, agents of the Nameless One, Mania’s father, take all of Animus’ friends as well. Also, Dr. Maxilla Yale is playing right into Mania’s hands by continuing her dream experiments on Jeremy Mason, almost allowing Mania and Animus’ sister Eris through the barrier.
name: Shadowlands

description:
"End of an Era" part 3, continued from VALOR #22. The Legion of Super-Heroes and the Legionnaires join forces as time continues to unravel. But even the combined might of these two teams may not be enough to stop the alliance of two of their deadliest foes. Continued in LEGIONNAIRES #18.

The Legionnaires of New Earth and the adult members of the Legion of Super-Heroes and their friends stand together in an assault on Baldur to free Rokk Krinn from Glorith and Mordru. Fighting the two most powerful beings in the universe isn't the only challenge, as the events of Zero Hour continue to cause the Legion's personal timeline havoc and steal allies left and right from history.
name: End Of An Era, Part Three: Infinite Possibilities

description: With Henry Bendix ousted as Weatherman, Synergy is assigned the position. Her force action as Weatherman is to send a team, led by Winter, to Russia, where they have asked for assistance in locating a military squad gone missing. Meanwhile, Hellstrike gains control of his new energy form with some help from Fuji.

Supreme Madness part 6 and finale: The fight between Pitt and Supreme was epic. But, finally, Pitt had succeed to steal his hammer to Supreme and the mad hero had lose the source of his power. 
Pitt is about to bring the final blow to his enemi (that he thinks as a Zoyvoid's agent) but a long-time memory returns: Supreme had save the creed planet from a asteroid and is seen like a savior in the Pitt nation. 
So, Pitt put down the supreme's hammer, inable to kill him. But Supreme Madness goes on. With his hammer returned, he attacks once again Pitt. 
The battle goes on and leads the two opponents in the bottom of a river. The hammer of supreme is charging up so and so and Pitt decides to get out of the zone. The energy of the hammer unleashed, all the area is shatterred. Pitt protects a young woman before Supreme goes out the river. But the energy he used was too huge and Supreme falls down. 
unconscious, Supreme dreams about the last evenments and his madness. When he wakes up, hours later, the police surrounds him but their vehicles was destroyed by a man equiped like Grizlock. 
In fact, it's Simple Simon who had steel the power suit. The battle goes on between Supreme and the hero, exhausted by all their precedent fights don't succeed to win. 
At this moment, Pitt appears and brokes the simple simon power suit. The fight is over. Pitt returns to his adventures and Supreme brings Simple Simon in order to find more explanations. 
The Supreme madness is over.
name: Supreme Madness, Part 6
Yesterday Will Be More Fun Than Tomorrow

description: The wizard Merlin wants to warn Jason Blood of Etrigan's son whom the Demon intends to unleash on Earth. To meet that threat, Blood enters into an uneasy alliance with Merlin - on the condition that the wizard reveal the truth about Blood's past.
name: Sons & Lovers

description: The wreckage of the U.S.S. Benchley is falling into a trench and is threatening to take Gunny with it! Even if the Armorines manage to save their field commander's neck, they'll still have to free Sirot from the clutches of the venomous Spider Aliens!
name: Fathoms Below, Part 3 - Enemy Action

description: Armstrong recounts his tale of the Crusades -- when his brother Gilad fought bravely under Richard the Lionhearted, and Armstrong angered a holy order into hunting him for the rest of eternity!
name: The Root Of The Problem - Part 2

description: Magnus and Leeja’s son Torque proves to be troublesome as he tries to find a place in the world for himself and also gets caught in a love triangle in “Bizarre Love Triangle.”
name: Bizarre Love Triangle
